comments:
Win2K, 20020205

Launched brand new drop. 

Clicked on Help>Information Center ... came up OK (but looking "flat", not like 
Eclipse help).
Closed Info Center help.

Clicked Help> Help Contents (experiments). Empty frame came up, disk was 
spinning for a long time (1+ minute), finally got http500 with the following 
root cause:

Restarted, and directly went to Help> Help Contents (experimental) ... same 
results (http500)

Reinstalled 20020205 driver in a path without spaces in the name .... this time 
things work. So, the problem seems to be caused if there are spaces in somewhere 
in the install path.

The batch compiler will be fixed in build 20020212. Previous tokenizing was 
over complex, simplified code and checked it behaves ok on this scenario.

Provided temporary fix, by enclosing each entry on the classpath by double 
quotes
